Detailed Description

The only one namespace of TinyODBC.

Everything is well organized under this namespace

Function Documentation

unsigned short tiodbc::version_major (  ) 

Get current major version of TinyODBC library.

The major version is increased only when we have major changes.

unsigned short tiodbc::version_minor (  ) 

Get current minor version of TinyODBC library.

The minor version is increased when new features are added/removed or API breakage occurs.

unsigned short tiodbc::version_revision (  ) 

Get current revision of this version.

The version revision number is changed only for bug fixes.
